Agata always knows how to make the best blowjob scenes next to the likes of new authors such as Pochi, and he really does the scenes justice with the way he depicts the act of giving a blowjob, the slow methodical up and down with the fast deepthroat action while cumming, It really shows just how much he thinks about while making these types of scenes. The doggy style scenes with the multiple penetrations was my favorite out of the bunch since It showed how decisive he Is when It comes to the giving of pleasure to both kids at the same time...all In all too many wonderful things to say about this work, I rate It l a 10/10, It Is a must read and everyone should have It In his/her collection.

Overall, this Is a great change of pace for Agata since he has always been working on MILF X son or sis X little bro, this Is I think the first time he has ever made a breaking the fourth wall sort of hentai so for that originality In such a simple concept of two girls liking shota I must congratulate him. The art style Is the classic Agata one with the curvy, fluffy, thick girls and the eyes being shaped In that classic way of his which shows the lewdness of everyone. The story which I touched on a little bit Is...so simple If you think about It yet I have not seen anyone try this sort of a concept before, the overall premise of two girls liking kids Is very refreshing as well as them not being related to the kids Is a new one for me, yet again Is a welcome change of pace. The sex scenes were fantastic, and they had the classic Agata angles of overhead views with lewd overhead frontal ones showing the expressions of the ladies and kids, the blowjob scenes were fantastic as well,
OH GOD, THIS IS SO GOOD....AGATA MY LOVE.
